flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to save up $100 because 14600 - 14500 = <<14600-14500=90>>90
He earned $60 off trips because 40 x 1.5 = <<40*1.5=60>>60
He earned $40 off groceries because 90 - 60 = <<90-60=30>>30
He delivered $800 in groceries because 30 / 0.05 = <<30/0.05=600>>600
#### 600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
